  • Method Details

    • onActionSaveAppointment

      public void onActionSaveAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Saves the user inputted appointment information and updates the appointment in the database. Start Time and End Time are selected using ComboBoxes which display the business's hours of operation (EST 8:00 - 22:00) in the user's local time. Start/End Time entries are checked to ensure Start Time is before End Time and that the customer has no conflicting appointments. Exception handling ensures that database primary key/foreign key values are inputted by the user. Other inputs are permitted to be left blank by the user for situational flexibility. Lambda function implemented to iterate through allAppointments as a stream and add the appointments which match the customerId, excluding the Appointment that is currently being modified.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the ActionEvent initiating the method, clicking on the Save Appointment button.
      Throws:
      SQLException - when accessing the database
      IOException - when calling the SceneChanger.changeScene() method

    • onActionCancel

      public void onActionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Returns the user to the Homepage, ignoring any user inputted data.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the ActionEvent initiating the method, clicking on the Cancel button.
      Throws:
      IOException - when calling the SceneChanger.changeScene() method.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the Modify Appointment page and populates the form with the selected Appointment's data and the relevant ComboBox data. The User ComboBox is populated with all Users in the database and the Start/End Time ComboBoxes are populated with the business's hours of operation (EST 8:00 - 22:00) in the user's local time.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - URL
      resourceBundle - ResourceBundle
